original: Kumler, Anton Nikolaus, komminister, Nitta, f. 17/9/00 i Vårkumla, Ska-rab. 1., av Alfred o. Al fridia Johanis-son. G. 44 m. Magnhild Tranberg. ■— Stud:ex. 24, teol. fil. ex. 26, teol. kand. 31. V. kommin. i Essunga 31, i Fagre 33, pastorsadj. i Väring 34, kommin. i Södra Ving, Härna, fr. 34. Ordf. i skolråd o. barnavrnd. Hobby: hembygdsvård. Finska med. Pro benigni-tate humana.
translated: Kumler, Anton Nikolaus, assistant minister, born on September 17, 1900 in Vårkumla, Ska-rab. 1. Son of Alfred and Alfridia Johanisson. Married in 1944 to Magnhild Tranberg. Completed high school in 1924, theological studies in 1926, and received a theological degree in 1931. Became assistant minister in Essunga in 1931, in Fagre in 1933, assistant pastor in Väring in 1934, and minister in Södra Ving and Härna from 1934. Chairman of the school council and child protection. Hobby: local heritage preservation. Fluent in Finnish. Pro benignitate humana.
